mention.text: bogota , 14 sep 89 -- diego biafara , administrative department of security and drug enforcement agency informant , who appeared before a u.s. senate committee on 13 september
the colonel wearing the dark blue shirt
statements made by biafara to the u.s. senate in which we learned of a clear link between the israeli mercenaries , who were training paramilitary groups in the middle magdalena region

statements made by biafara to the u.s. senate in which we learned of a clear link between the israeli mercenaries , who were training paramilitary groups in the middle magdalena region , and the british mercenaries who came to the country allegedly to assassinate pablo escobar
the same ones who trained the assassins paid by the cartel itself
the mercenaries who were preparing to assassinate one of the medellin cartel leaders
one of the medellin cartel leaders
